Package edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.model.dao

Interface PostRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Post,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Post,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Post,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Post>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Post,​java.util.UUID>
    public interface PostRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Post,​java.util.UUID>
    The PostRepository extends the JpaRepository, which provides the CRUD (create, read, update, delete) functions, as well as providing the ability to delete records in batches.

      Retrieves a list of Post via a keyword specified by the user.
      java.util.List<Post> getPostByTimestamp​(java.util.Date timestamp)

        Parameters:
